name: TIEMPO
description:
"Tiempo" is a 3rd person singleplayer platfomer puzzle game in a Steampunk setting where you play as inventor Thiago and utilize time altering mechanics to stop your rival from finishing his evil machine.

"Truly Tired Games" is proud to present to you our latest release "Tiempo" in which we spent around 6 months developing it as our final project while our studies in Vancouver Film School.
